price: Ka buga musu misãlin rãyuwar dũniya, kamar ruwane wanda Muka saukar da shi daga sama sa'an nan tsirin ƙasa ya garwaya da shi, sa'an nan ya wãyi gari dudduga, iska tanã shiƙar sa. Kuma Allah Ya kasance Mai yawan ĩkon yi ne a kan dukan kõme.
arabic: وَٱضۡرِبۡ لَهُم مَّثَلَ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا كَمَآءٍ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ فَٱخۡتَلَطَ بِهِۦ نَبَاتُ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَأَصۡبَحَ هَشِيمٗا تَذۡرُوهُ ٱلرِّيَٰحُۗ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ مُّقۡتَدِرًا

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-iḍ'rib lahum mathala al-ḥayati al-dun'yā kamāin anzalnāhu mina al-samāi fa-ikh'talaṭa bihi nabātu al-arḍi fa-aṣbaḥa hashīman tadhrūhu al-riyāḥu wakāna al-lahu ʿalā kulli shayin muq'tadiran
